elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Sort the Excel list of used cars according to the specifications and then answer the following questions.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: ... in ascending order of the year of the cars. What is the model name of the oldest used car on offer?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: ... in ascending order by car make, then by type and by price. How many Opels are on offer?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: ... by price (lowest price at the top). How much does the most expensive used car on offer cost?
